Reviews.Title: Functional, but disappointing
Reviews.Author: Jim M Ramsay
Reviews.Content: I got this for an inexpensive travel phone. It is quirky, often not charging when the phone is on, but having to be turned off to accept a recharge. It has a proprietary connector, so you can't use the same cables as other devices. The menus are not overly intuitive. I had thought being a Samsung was a safe bet, but this is not their top product! But it does work, though.

Reviews.Title: Samsung M2310 flip phone
Reviews.Author: oraldo garcia
Reviews.Content: I liked it  so much, so I ordered a second one. For anybody that want a handy cell phone without. Not a single complaint, reception is super and much better than other phones I had before. O. Garcia
